description_fields.The Experience: 🧗‍♀️🧗‍♀️🧗‍♀️🧗‍♀️ Join us for this exciting and thrilling adventure of Bungee jumping! This activity has developed and improved a lot recently. The current safety systems are far superior to those used a short time ago. The double calculation of the jump has made this activity safe. An experienced team will guide you through the local environment and teach you how to respect it and appreciate it at its best.

description_fields.The experience:
🧗‍♀️🧗‍♀️🧗‍♀️🧗‍♀️ Have you ever discovered the closest mountains around Las Palmas de Gran Canaria? Want to feel like a real Guanche?
Localbird offers this local experience in order to find out some secret spots and viewpoints in Las Palmas area.“Las crestas” are geological forms (ridge) that every mountaineer falls in love with. In this route close to the capital which can be easily reached, you can climb and even try a simple climb to move along a ridge from which you can see the best views of the capital, the isthmus, and the cliffs of the north of Gran Canaria. From the top, you’ll feel like you’re almost flying… before descending a ravine where you’ll be able to initiate yourself in descents by doing a 15-meter rappel.No previous experience in climbing or rappelling is necessary, only some skill in moving on mountain routes. It is an ideal activity to lose your fear of heights or if you are curious about the mountain world beyond hiking. As a reward, a landscape dominated by the sea and all the geological history of Gran Canaria piled layer by layer on the cliffs.Meeting point: Under the bridge of Las Arenas: https://goo.gl/maps/r3yZYdwafA9dSdgM8– Type of route: Circular
– Physical level: Medium
– Technical difficulty: Medium
– Climbing level: IV
– Maximum rappel height: 15 m- Distance: 4 km
– Elevation gain: +/- 250 m
– Duration: 3-4 hours
description_fields.Included:
– Guide (Spanish – English)
– Insurance
– Equipment (harness, helmet…)
– Snack
– Souvenir Photos

description_fields.The experience: It is a multi-adventure tour through sea cliffs where we will have jumps into the water from different heights, a zip line that crosses a cave and ends in the sea, a via ferrata above the waves and abseiling directly to the sea, all alternating with swimming sections and visits to caves.This is an exclusive alternative loxal experience in Gran Canaria that you can only do with us! One of our star activities, possibly the most fun, complete and original.
description_fields.Meeting point: We will meet at 9:30 am at the parking lot of Taurito. Join our WhatsApp group for more information.
description_fields.Included:
Zip line
Local guide (specialized guide-monitor)
Souvenir photos
liability and accident insurance
Coasteering
Caves and tunnels discovery
Wetsuit, harness, helmet, carabiner, life jacket, picnic of fruit, chocolate, cookies and water
description_fields.Requirements: The only requirements that the participant must meet for this local experience: to know how to swim, not to have excessive fear of heights or vertigo, regardless of age, since even children can do it (from 12 years old and always accompanied by their parents).
description_fields.Remember:
Bring comfortable clothes, a warm jacket for the after-activity, sneakers (which will get wet) and other footwear to change, swimsuit and towel.

💃🕺 Let’s learn to dance with local dancers!
Whether you are a couple, a group of friends, family, or even a solo traveler, you will have a lot of fun.💃🕺 Remember: humans are made to move their bodies with music: everyone can dance; the only thing that stops you is being shy. That’s why the experience will be lived in a funny and comfortable way.
Technically, you will discover some tips that will allow you to dance like real dancers.Other things to note:
No dance experience needed.

description_fields.The experience:
Join us for an immersive food workshop where you’ll explore the authentic flavors of Gran Canaria! Using fresh, seasonal ingredients such as tomatoes, Gofio, cheese, mojo picón, and octopus, you’ll create and savor traditional dishes under expert guidance. Enjoy a local beer or drink as you learn the fascinating history and cultural significance behind each ingredient and recipe. This hands-on experience blends cooking, tasting, and storytelling for a unique journey into local culinary heritage.Flexible Scheduling: Available any day, with optimal hours from 7:00 pm to 10:00 pm for a cozy evening vibe.
Dietary Options: Vegan and vegetarian alternatives available upon request (please inform us at the time of booking).

description_fields.Meeting point: MONDAY AND THURSDAY : We will meet around 9:15 am on the beach of the haystack, next to the restaurant Bahía del pajar.TUESDAY : We will meet around 9:30 on the beach of Taurito, at the access ramp to the beach.Join our WhatsApp group for more information.
description_fields.Included: All necessary equipment, kayak, vests, paddles, watertight compartments, beach games such as paddles, frisbie, goggles and snorkel tube, picnic consisting of fruit, chocolate, cookies and water, liability and accident insurance, specialized guide-monitor, as well as photographic report.
description_fields.Where does experience take place?:
Our route is designed along the south coast of Gran Canaria, which offers us safety and good weather.The activity can be done all year round, because of Gran Canarias perfect and warm climate during the whole year.
MONDAY AND THURSDAY: We have the route from Arguineguín to the beach of Montaña Arena, we will visit an archaeological site which we interpret and several coves until we reach the great beach of Montaña Arena where we will rest and have time to play the games we carry, see fish or sunbathe.TUESDAY: We go along the coast of Mogan, along its cliffs and caves, so we can get into them. We also visit Mogan and rest on the lonely beach of Tiritaña where we snorkel.
description_fields.What are the requirements for this activ: The only requirements that the participant has to meet for this local experience: to know how to swim, regardless of age, since even children from 6 years old can do it always accompanied by their parents.

description_fields.The experience:
Embark on an unforgettable journey through the three most important markets in the lower area of Las Palmas while pedaling through the most beautiful corners of the city. Accompanied by an Official Guide from the Canary Islands, you will have the opportunity to taste the most outstanding and special local products.  
During this adventure, you will try exotic fruits, a variety of Canarian cheeses, and the best pinchos that the city has to offer. You will also personally meet the wonderful people working in small businesses, who will share stories about their products and traditions.  
We will begin our tour at Mercado de Vegueta, the most historic and traditional market on the island. Here you can taste different varieties of the Canarian banana, our star product, along with other seasonal tropical fruits. Don’t miss the chance to try the first coffee grown in Europe: Agaete coffee, produced in northern Gran Canaria. A true delight!  
We will continue enjoying the best views of the city as we pedal towards Mercado Central, located in the heart of Las Palmas. This market is essential for the local community, and you will have time to do your own shopping and explore its charms.  
Finally, we will conclude our experience at Mercado del Puerto, a vibrant and diverse place where, in addition to traditional stalls, you will find bars offering an international variety of pinchos and tapas. Here you can savor local wines or beers and enjoy other iconic products such as Canarian cheese and papas arrugadas with mojo. You will have the opportunity to taste different varieties of Canarian cheeses, including the famous Queso Flor de Guía and Queso Majorero, recognized as some of the best cheeses in the world.

description_fields.The experience:
Discover Las Palmas by Bike Tour! This exciting activity offers a unique local experience as we explore Gran Canaria’s vibrant capital. Pedal through scenic routes, uncover hidden gems, and enjoy an unforgettable adventure in Las Palmas!
Explore the streets of this historic, modern and cosmopolitan city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria on comfortable Dutch-style bicycles , full of friendly people and considered to be the best climate in the world. We want to make you feel at home, so you will receive all the information you need to make the most of your stay on the island. If you are from the land, you will be able to discover legends that you have probably never heard before.
Discover the local culture of Las Palmas and delve into the history of the most populated city in the Canary Islands, from the first aboriginal settlements to the Spanish conquest. Pedal back in time through the old town where you will enjoy the most emblematic places in the city. Be amazed as you listen to the best stories from an Official Guide of the Canary Islands about a place that has suffered several pirate attacks and that you will be able to discover during the trip. 
This local experience is made for travelers that want to deep dive into the local customs and community, The Mercado de Vegueta represent the most authentic and local environment that you can find in the city
Flexible Scheduling: 
Available on Wednesday (5pm to 9pm) and Saturday (10am to 2pm)

description_fields.The Experience:
We will visit the north side of Gran Canaria and some hidden spots, natural pools and local communities.
 Only when the weather and the sea provide perfect conditions can we have the privilege of diving into a magical sea cave, where the light hits the waves and gives us the most special pic of our journey.
  Many other natural pools are on our list for this activity, ready to be discovered as a local would.
 The local communities in the northern area of Gran Canaria are very authentic. Generations of fishermen have lived along this coast for many years. We learn with Nestor how to respect them and have a positive impact on the local communities by discovering the places in a conscious way.
 Finally we will finish our adventure by enjoying sunset time in a strategical spot of the island.
*Depending on sea and weather conditions, the excursion may vary.

description_fields.The Experience: We will leave from Las Palmas and go to the north of Gran Canaria: we will stop to a fisherman village, where we can admire the second-highest cliffs in the world and have lunch. We will go to the only place that cultivates and produce coffee in European territory! There, we will learn a bit about local culture and the process of the coffee, also we will get the opportunity of trying some local cheeses, wines and jellies.

description_fields.The Experience:
We will visit the north side of Gran Canaria and some hidden spots, natural pools and local communities.
 Only when the weather and the sea provide perfect conditions can we have the privilege of diving into natural sea pools or to explore wild beaches.
We will also practice some snorkeling if the weather and tide conditions let us do so.
  Many other natural pools are on our way, ready to be discovered as a local would.
 The local communities in the northern area of Gran Canaria are very authentic. Generations of fishermen have lived along this coast for many years. We learn how to respect them and have a positive impact on the local communities by discovering the places in a conscious way.
 Finally we will enjoy sunset time in a strategical spot of the island.
*Depending on sea and weather conditions, the excursion may vary.

description_fields.The Experience:
We will visit the south side of Gran Canaria, discovering the local side of a very touristic area.
 We will first have lunch in a restaurant inside a cave. Aboriginal caves in Gran Canaria were used by the very first inhabitants to protect from attacks and to store food. Learn more about the ancient story of Canaries with Localbird.
  According to weather conditions and tide we can have the opportunity to discover hidden sea caves by kayak or to discover one of the last wild beaches of the south.
   Finally we will enjoy the sunset in a natural sea cave close to a very well-known beach (according to weather and tide conditions). We learn with Nestor how to respect local communities and have a positive impact on the local communities by discovering the places in a conscious way.
*Depending on sea and weather conditions, the excursion may vary.

Souvenir Photos and videos
Local tour

local lunch (please let us know about food restrictions)

*Kayaking can be included or not according to the number of people

description_fields.The experience: Explore the local side of Gran Canaria with Localbird, the North Coast is the most authentic side of this island and full of surprises. We will deep dive into the local customs and learn from the culture. We will trek along the dramatic coastline, where rugged cliffs meet the Atlantic Ocean, offering breathtaking views and a true sense of the island’s natural beauty. This trail is perfect for travelers looking to connect with Gran Canaria’s wild landscapes.

description_fields.The Experience:
Discover the undersea life during night at beautiful beaches of Las Palmas, Gran Canaria.
🐠🐟🐬🐡 This activity is a guided snorkeling local experience that you can only enjoy with particular conditions of the tide. An experienced team will guide you through the local fauna and teach you how to respect it and appreciate it at its best. Dive into this unforgettable experience and discover the wonders of the underwater world. Don’t miss out on this adventure!

description_fields.The experience:
Discover the local sea life of Gran Canaria with Localbird The Canary Islands are famous for their subtropical water with the water temperature varying from a mild 17 degrees in the winter to an average of 24 degrees in the summer months.
The Canary Islands were formed by volcanic eruptions and as a result make for some pretty spectacular diving! Don’t miss out on this adventure!
The Canary Islands are renowned for their rich biodiversity of marine life, a destination where scuba divers can expect to see a mixture of tropical, Mediterranean and Atlantic marine species on every dive.
Learn more about sustainability in the sea coast and how to protect this beautiful environment.1️⃣ we will first have a theory class by our local experts
2️⃣ after it they will give us a test that we need to pass to be able to do the activity, so please, pay attention to the theory!
3️⃣ Once you have passed the test, you can start the incredible experience of scuba diving.
description_fields.Included:
Theoric Class
Equipment
Insurance
Expert Instructor
Diving session

description_fields.The Experience:
This activity is a unique way to enjoy sunset time.
🐠🐟🐬🐡 Now you can say you have had an aperitif in the middle of the ocean.
We will sail from Playa Chica, Las Palmas, to the middle of the ocean, where a rock barrier called “La Barra” will let us land with our Kayak. On your arrival you will enjoy some food and drinks in the middle of the ocean. Don’t miss out on this adventure!

description_fields.The experience:
This romantic experience is a unique way in Gran Canaria to enjoy sunset time and good food with your loved ones. There are no other moments or ways to enjoy it as we do. 
Even if you can see it from the beach, no one else can say to have had an aperitif in the middle of the ocean.We will meet up at Playa Chica and sail until “La Barra”, a little bit far from the city.
There we will join the sunset with Special food homemade by Canarian people, offered by Localbird.

description_fields.The experience: It is an itinerary prepared with different metallic elements such as staples, rungs, chains… to make it more accessible. This is the highest level of hiking in Gran Canaria and a good initiation to climbing. A vertical hiking experience, climbing a wall of 80m high and 250m long. There are cable bridges, zip lines, ladders… it is the most varied and exiting via ferrata you can find in Gran Canaria. Equipped with helmet, harnesses and anchor ropes, we will advance secured by a steel cable at all times. It is essential not to have vertigo.– Duration: 3-4 hours
description_fields.Meeting point: We will meet at 9:30 am at the Astronomical Viewpoint Degollada de las Yeguas. Join the WhatsApp group for more information
description_fields.Included: Helmet, harness, energy dissipators, picnic of fruit, chocolate, cookies and water, liability insurance and specialized guide-monitor, in addition to the photographic report.
description_fields.Where does it take place?:
This local experience is located in the south of Gran Canaria, in the degollada de las yeguas.
The activity can be done all year round, because of Gran Canarias perfect and warm climate during the whole year.
description_fields.What are the requirements for this activ: The only requirements that the participant must meet are: not to have excessive fear of heights or vertigo, regardless of age, since even children can do it (from 12 years old and always accompanied by their parents).
description_fields.What do you need to bring for this adven: The only thing a person needs to bring for this activity is: sneakers, comfortable clothes and be ready for an adventure!

description_fields.The experience:
This is one of our most popular local experiences that takes place in Gran Canaria and undoubtedly our specialty, very fun, aimed at people who want to enjoy nature while doing sport.It is an adventure activity that consists of descending through a ravine or canyon, following the course of the water, where different exercises are combined such as: walking, jumping, climbing, swimming, rappelling and enjoying!Depending on the canyon chosen, we will have forests with waterfalls, or hilarious ravines with jumps of different heights and natural slides.
The activity can be done all year round, because of Gran Canarias perfect and warm climate during the whole year.
Get ready for an adventure!
description_fields.Meeting point: We will meet at 9:30 in the parking lot of Decathlon Telde. Join our  WhatsApp group for more information.

– Guide (Spanish – English) and specialized guide-monitor 
– Wetsuit and PPE 
– Equipment (harness, helmet…) 
– Picnic consisting of fruit, chocolate, cookies and water 
– Photographic report 
– Liability and accident insurance 
– Private transport
description_fields.Required:
Swimsuit
Sneakers (which will get wet)
Extra dry shoes to change at the end of the activity (to be left in the car with a towel and dry clothes).
Required to know how to swim, not to have excessive fear of heights or vertigo, Regardless of age, since even children can do it (from 12 years old and always accompanied by their parents).
